text: 18.9: Mt 5.29; 17.27; Mk 9.47Ndun rɨma thueŋ ndu ŋgɨrgɨrim, ndu tɨva mbatɨk thueŋ muuŋgip, ndu mba rɨmaeŋ sigɨp ne fekhɨngiri. Ndu maaŋ muuŋgip, ndu rɨma bueŋra khɨgɨp, ndu ŋgun vhuun ŋgɨgɨp, ndu zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨŋ ndigirga. Ndu maaŋ muuŋgirga fhu, ndu rɨmani vhɨra kɨrga mbe ndu fegɨp Herar vhava khɨngirga.
